definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

pinyin: bian4 yi4 xing2 Ke4 Ya3 shi4 zheng4

sentences.english: A quantitative analysis of the variation pattern of characters of the Viola variegata complex.
sentences.chinese: 斑叶堇菜种宗性状变异式样的定量分析。

sentences.english: The structure variance of soil nutrient is bigger than the random variance.
sentences.chinese: 毛竹林土壤养分的结构性变异大于随机变异。

sentences.english: The structure variance of soil nutrient is bigger than the random variance.
sentences.chinese: 毛竹林土壤养分的结构性变异大于随机变异。

sentences.english: The instability of morphological variation in flower of Z. grandiflora might be related to transposable genetic element.
sentences.chinese: 花形变异的不稳定性可能与转座遗传因子有关。

sentences.english: Gradually the bloom withered, love fire is not extinguishable.
sentences.chinese: 渐老芳华，爱火未灭而变异。

sentences.english: I see it as another human variation.
sentences.chinese: ‘我把它看作是人类的变异之一。’

sentences.english: That best form became the next parent, begetting other mutations .
sentences.chinese: 那个最佳形态成为下一个父代，带来其他变异。

sentences.english: Pectins are composed of a galactose derivative, chitin of a glucose derivative.
sentences.chinese: 果胶是由半乳糖变异体和葡萄糖变异体角素构成。

sentences.english: Pectins are composed of a galactose derivative, chitin of a glucose derivative.
sentences.chinese: 果胶是由半乳糖变异体和葡萄糖变异体角素构成。

sentences.english: Those variants equip an organism specially well to cope with the exigencies of the environments.
sentences.chinese: 变异使生物体配备得特别完善以应付环境的严酷要求。

sentences.english: The variable number of floral organs was observed in nsr spikelets.
sentences.chinese: 裸粒水稻小穗内的花器官数日也有较大的变异。

sentences.english: A variation of LSI is called probabilistic latent semantic.
sentences.chinese: 集成电路是一种变异称为概率潜在语义。

sentences.english: The intensity of infection may be an essential factor that affects the intra-individual variation of egg counts.
sentences.chinese: 感染度是影响虫卵计量个体内变异的根本原因。

sentences.english: The mutation means that Duffy receptor proteins are not made in red cells.
sentences.chinese: 变异意味着趋化因子的蛋白质不再由红血球制造产生。

sentences.english: Somatic mutation --- A mutation occurring in a somatic cell rather than in the germline.
sentences.chinese: 发生在体细胞而非种系中的可遗传的变异。

sentences.english: These indicated that Zhujiahu population had higher genetic diversity than the others.
sentences.chinese: 表明朱家湖群体保持着较高的遗传变异。

definition: to live in or on another organism as a parasite/to live by taking advantage of others/parasitism/parasitic
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
